alicia.title: Alicia @ Gateway Discovery Park
alicia.bio: Alicia is a multi-media creation of Nicky Kriara. It's at Portland's newest public space, Gateway Discovery Park.

martha.title: Martha @ Bridgeport Village
martha.bio: Martha is a delightful collaboration from returning Piano. Push. Play. artists Lettie Jane Rennekamp , Cassandra Swan, and Michael Buchino.  Open during business hours.

idil.title: Idil @ The Portland Children's Museum
idil.bio: The always delightful Julz Nally created this piano, waiting for you at our most fun location. Open during business hours.

christine.title: Christine @ ADX
christine.bio: This piano is a delight! It's inside ADX, our long-time partners. Call to see if they're open and go play!

stevie.title: Stevie @ Doug Fir Lounge
stevie.bio: This piano, decorated by the team at Doug Fir, represents all the great bands that have played there. Open during business hours.

maria.title: Maria @ Society Hotel Rooftop
maria.bio: Up on the roof overlooking Portland in the Summer air, find this wonderful piano with a timely message.  Open during business hours.

annie.title: Annie @ Portland Art Museum
annie.bio: Designer Deadstock Coffee gives us this simple piano at our flagship location. Go play it! Open during business hours.

wendy.title: Wendy @ OHSU tram
wendy.bio: The team at Open Eye Art brings us this delightful racoon from our previous seasons. Now, it's at a new location, at OHSU at the tram on the South Waterfront.

liszt.title: Liszt @ World Forestry Center
liszt.bio: This piano is uniquely Portland and a must-see work of art.  Decorated by North and in its forever home at the World Forestry Center. Open during business hours. Visit and play!

nina.title: Nina @ Know Thy Food Coop
nina.bio: First seen in our 2015 season, this delightful piano by Julianna Bright is waiting for you among the food carts. Open during business hours. Visit and play!

haydn.title: Haydn @ Portland Center Stage
haydn.bio: This quietly classic design from our 2015 season features a detailed map of Portland presented in gold. Open during business hours. Visit, play, and take in a show!

anna.title: Anna @ Luscher Farm
anna.bio: Maureen Long's colorful design is still available at Luscher Farms, waiting for you to visit. Open during business hours.
